alert.note: Alert for Southwest Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 01 at 9:15PM MDT until November 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Carbon County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds could be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
